select id, title, content, type, level, sender_id, sender_name, target_type, push_type, is_published, publish_time, scheduled_time, expire_time, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by

mapper.select: select sys_message.id as id, sys_message.title as title, sys_message.content as content, sys_message.type as type, sys_message.level as level, sys_message.sender_id as sender_id, sys_message.sender_name as sender_name, sys_message.target_type as target_type, sys_message.push_type as push_type, sys_message.is_published as is_published, sys_message.publish_time as publish_time, sys_message.scheduled_time as scheduled_time, sys_message.expire_time as expire_time, sys_message.is_deleted as is_deleted, sys_message.create_time as create_time, sys_message.update_time as update_time, sys_message.create_by as create_by, sys_message.update_by as update_by from sys_message join sys_user_message sum on sys_message.id = sum.message_id where sum.user_id = #{userId}
